name: Alien
description: You are not from this world, but either you or your ship crashed here. You are stranded and trying to make your way or help others survive.
specialAbility: Immune to most Earth-born diseases. Can use alien tech without penalty.

originFeatures.name: B-Lister: Outcast Observer
originFeatures.description: Gain proficiency in Technology or Survival. You can understand any Earth language after listening for a short time.

originFeatures.name: A-Lister: Bioplasmic Armor
originFeatures.description: Once per Long Rest, reduce incoming damage by 5 as your alien biology hardens under stress.

name: Supernatural
description: You were once human but now are something else. You may be a vampire, werewolf, ghost, or other being, trying to hold onto your humanity.
specialAbility: You don’t need to eat or breathe, and you have Darkvision.

originFeatures.name: B-Lister: Blooded
originFeatures.description: Gain advantage on saving throws against fear. Your supernatural nature makes you difficult to frighten.

originFeatures.name: A-Lister: Night Stalker
originFeatures.description: Once per Long Rest, teleport in shadows up to 30 ft.

name: Highly Trained
description: You don’t have superpowers, but you’ve pushed your body and mind to the limit through discipline and training.
specialAbility: Gain one extra Feat at character creation.

originFeatures.name: B-Lister: Tactical Mind
originFeatures.description: Gain +1 to Initiative and may reroll one failed Intelligence or Wisdom check per Long Rest.

originFeatures.name: A-Lister: Peak Human
originFeatures.description: Add your proficiency bonus to all saving throws for 1 minute, once per Long Rest.
